channel.title: Message system
channel.description:
Hello, ive been considering if im avaible to create a message center system via interface and doc.
Like i would add an extra line to the character file on creation then when i wanna whrite a message to them ill whrite it in a file called like: messages.java then i would add like checkmessage"+playerName+"(); but i got close to no idea on how to make it work:P
it should be like you type ::messagecenter, then if you got messages your avaible to click on it where it says like "Subject - Date - Time - Sender" and if you dont got any it tells you.
Anyone know how i could make this work?, then please tell me!:P
And sorry for my bad english im danish;)!
